message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500? This product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
